scripts.docker:dev: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml watch --no-up & docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml attach api docs
scripts.docker:dev:build: export COMPOSE_FILE=./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml && cd $(dirname $COMPOSE_FILE) && docker buildx bake --file $(basename $COMPOSE_FILE) --load && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.docker:e2e: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d; bun run test:e2e; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.docker:e2e-ci: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d; bun run test:e2e-ci; docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.docker:prod:build: export COMPOSE_FILE=./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml && cd $(dirname $COMPOSE_FILE) && docker buildx bake --file $(basename $COMPOSE_FILE) --load && cd - > /dev/null
scripts.kube:dev: bun run kube:dev:build && bun run kube:dev:run
scripts.kube:prod: bun run kube:prod:build && bun run kube:prod:run
scripts.kube:e2e: TARGET_HOST=api.domain.local TARGET_PORT=80 bun run kube:dev; bun run test:e2e
scripts.kube:e2e-ci: TARGET_HOST=api.domain.local TARGET_PORT=80 bun run kube:prod; bun run test:e2e-ci
